column5: Well last post for a week Im off tommorow to claim our free trip to Sandles in Cuba Rods are packed pair of shorts a T shirt forget the drawers going commando very small luggage profile compared to my better halves and the all important coleman cooler jug fits a Quart and mix and ice very nicely...can you say 7 days in a fog!!!! I will try and get online at the resort and shoot some pictures Did  I say how much I really hate flying....guess thats why they serve alcohol   Tightlines and Stiff rods all Later Peter
Good luck Peter!  Have a great time...looking foward to your report.  Safe trip!
Have a great trip Pete and good luck down there !!  What's with the new avatar, is that sposed to be a challenge  for 3 weeks from now ??
Have a great trip Pete...hope you get your fill of big ones down there...  Maureen
Thanks all  Have a great trip Pete and good luck down there !!  What's with the new avatar, is that sposed to be a challenge for 3 weeks from now ??  Psychological Warfare!!!!!!
Don't forget the Rapala Skitter Walk and high-speed erratic retrieve for those Barracuda!  Have a great trip! I know you will.  Tony

Have a great time Pete. Don't worry about the flying, at 35,000' there's not a heck of a lot you can do to control your destiny anyway.........(other than much scotch, which helps you not to give a rat's donkey)....  John...
Peter,all Ican say is....oh..never mind.have a great time.  Steve
